name: MathsGame
0:
”Alexa ask Maths Game to ask me a question”
”Alexa ask Maths Game to ask me an easy question”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: maths game
des:
This skill allows the user to ask for a Maths question. Once a question has been asked the use will then respond with the answer. If the answer is correct or incorrect the user will be told. If incorrect the user can answer again with the correct number. To get another question, the used will ask for another question.
The type of question and the numbers involved are random.
To get started say "Alexa ask Maths Game to ask me a question".
Alexa will then ask you a Maths question.
Say the answer as a number only. For example "five".
For another question, say "Ask me a question".
Alternatively, say "Alexa ask Maths Game to ask me an easy question".
Alexa will then ask you an easy Maths question.
Say the answer as a number only. For example "five".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
